name: A Game in VB.NET About Starting at the End
name_original: A Game in VB.NET About Starting at the End
description:
Code by TheGrumpyGameDev.

Music and final boss art by LynxOfUndyin477.

Enjoy being eaten by the Final Boss.

This game was developed using TDD over the course of about 1.5 - 2 hours per day.

As a result, there is not much content, but what content there is works.
